about_the_game:
Academy Love Saga: Tennis Angels EX is a Tennis game with dynamic action-oriented gameplay. Control cute girls and compete in exciting matches with strategic positioning and masterful usage of special skills. Enjoy the hilarious story of how a retired Tennis coach regains his former glory.

Demo Content

  • 4 story chapters.

  • 2 playable characters.

  • 2 fully voiced and animated sex scenes.

  • 1 tournament.

Thrilling Tennis Gameplay

Execute charged shots to place the ball perfectly in your opponent's court, or rush the net for intense close-range play, all while risking a skilled lob from your adversary. Be cautious of your stamina, as running out can lead to serious trouble. Build up enough Tension to unleash special skills and overpower your opponent. This game tests both your physical prowess and strategic thinking.

Train Your Players

Enhance your characters by leveling them up to boost their stats and unlock powerful new skills for matches. Buy equipment that complements their playstyle. With a variety of characters each featuring different stat growths and skills, you will need to unlock them in Campaign Mode. Experiment with different players to find the one that fits your playstyle the best.

Captivating Storyline

For those who appreciate the narrative, this game offers plenty of engaging "plots" (in every sense). Enjoy a humorous and dramatic storyline as you take on the role of an overlooked coach winning the approval (and affection) of his beautiful female club members. Each character has their own "Love Stories" that unlock gradually as you train and level them up. Gotta catch... cough train them all!

Grand Tournament

Bring your trained characters to the epic Global Underground Tournament and showcase the results of their hard work. Face off against formidable opponents in the tennis world. Will you emerge victorious and claim the title of Supreme Champion?

Sexy Tennis Girls

Enjoy hot and erotic "special" scenes with the girls you have conquered. Not only girls in your club, you can even tap the girls in the Global Underground Tournament after they were defeated. The winner takes all!

content_descriptors.notes: This game has adult themes, language, and fictional characters depicted in sexual situations. All characters depicted are over the age of 18. The game features nude characters in sexual acts, non-consensual sex, and BDSM.
